content: increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4-8 single_crochet around 18st 5 rnds 9 decrease single_crochet around 12 10-12 single_crochet around 12 13 decrease single_crochet x4 decrease single_crochet x4 10 14-24 single_crochet around 10st 12 rnds slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing legs make 2 - first 5 rounds are done in black then switch to dark brown 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6-10 single_crochet around 30st 5 rnds 11 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 12-13 single_crochet around 24 14 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 15-17 single_crochet around 18st 3 rnds slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing tail in hot sauce or same as head color 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3-30 single_crochet around 28 rounds of 12 single_crochet ears make 2 in hot sauce or same as head color 1 4sc into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet around 6 3 increase single_crochet around 9 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 12 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 15 6-7 single_crochet around for 2 rounds slip_stitch into next st f o leave tail for sewing assembly weave in ends as you go head i prefer to do everything on the head before sewing pieces together eyes are placed between rounds 11 & 12 9 stitches apart the nose is centered 2 rounds below the eyes ears are placed about 7-8 rounds/stitches above/behind the eyes keep six row between the ears use the black thread or yarn to sew on a little smile or smirk body stuff the body firmly but not so full that it stretches out the stitches try to keep the bottom flatter while stuffing to help kitty be able to sit upright sew head to body using the tail from the head and stitching through the front loops left from the last row of the head legs stuff legs full but not firm sew the legs to the body in line with the eyes the bottom of the leg should be sewn on at round 5-6 arms stuff the paws then very lightly stuff the arms flatten the open end place arms on the side of the body directly below the head somewhat in line with the ear sew through both layers the paws should rest nicely between the legs tail do not stuff the tail sew tail to the butt with the underside sewn at the same round as the bottoms of the legs lil freddy s fedora you will need brown & 3 5mm hook worked in the round keep your stitches pretty tight 1 single_crochet 7 into magic_ring 2 increase around 14 3 increase single_crochet around 21 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 28 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 35 6 increase single_crochet x4 around 42 7 increase single_crochet x5 around 49 8 blo single_crochet around 49 9-16 single_crochet around 8 rounds of 49
